message.content:
Search through all frontend pages in src/app/ for any mention of "LOOKSMAXXLABS", "LOOKSMAXX LABS", "Looksmaxx Labs", or similar variations. Check page.tsx files, layout.tsx files, and any components they import.

List all files and line numbers where these appear. This needs to be changed to "PROJECT CASSANOVA".

Be thorough - check titles, headers, meta tags, footers, etc.

content.text: I'll search through the frontend codebase for mentions of "LOOKSMAXXLABS" and related variations, then compile a comprehensive list of all occurrences.
Let me try broader patterns and check different variations:
Let me check the layout files and pages more directly:
Now let me read the main layout and page files to check for any branding mentions:

file.content:
'use client'; import Link from 'next/link'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { ArrowRight, Check, ShieldCheck, Microscope, Sparkles, Dna, Target, BarChart3, Users, Camera, Cpu, FileText, ChevronRight, Star, Globe, Zap, } from 'lucide-react'; export default function HomePage() { const features = [ { icon: Microscope, title: '120+ Landmarks', description: 'Sub-millimeter precision mapping of facial biometrics using MediaPipe + InsightFace dual-engine', }, { icon: Dna, title: 'PSL Rating', description: 'Scientific attractiveness percentile ranking based on neo-classical canons', }, { icon: Target, title: 'Improvement Plan', description: 'Personalized surgical and non-surgical roadmap with cost estimates', }, { icon: BarChart3, title: 'Progress Tracking', description: 'Compare analyses over time and track your transformation', }, ]; const steps = [ { num: '01', title: 'Upload Your Photos', description: 'Front and side profile photos for complete biometric analysis', icon: Camera, }, { num: '02', title: 'AI Analysis Engine', description: '120+ landmarks mapped with 99.8% precision across diverse lighting conditions', icon: Cpu, }, { num: '03', title: 'Receive Your Report', description: 'PSL rating, strengths, flaws, and personalized improvement roadmap', icon: FileText, }, ]; const plans = [ { name: 'Free Analysis', price: '$0', period: 'Preview', features: [ 'Baseline Harmony Score', '3 Core Biometric Ratios', 'Top Strength Analysis', 'Limited Area Identification', ], cta: 'Start Free', highlighted: false, }, { name: 'Project Cassanova Pro', price: '$49', period: 'Lifetime', badge: 'Best Value', features: [ 'Full 60+ Ratio Breakdown', 'PSL Rating & Global Percentile', 'Surgical & Non-Surgical Plan', 'High-Res PDF Case Report', 'Landmark Overlay Access', 'Community Elite Access', ], cta: 'Unlock Everything', highlighted: true, }, { name: 'Expert Review', price: '$299', period: 'One-Time', badge: 'Sold Out', features: [ 'Manual PHD Analysis', 'Video Consultation', 'Custom Morphing', 'Surgeon Referral', 'Priority Support', ], cta: 'Join Waitlist', highlighted: false, }, ]; return (
